attributes.action: limit the amount of people we let in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to have a limit on the amount of people we let in this country, it is getting ridiculous can  the Goverment not see this is why there are long waiting lists for people to go in hospital why our schools and public transport is overcrowded, surely it is simple Mathmatics that the more people we have here the more our sevices that we pay for are going to suffer no matter how much money is spent. We are are only a small country and we are in danger of losing our identity, i go to some parts of Britain and it is scary i feel like i am the minority. I do not hate people who want to come here to create a better life but come on we need to draw the line somewhere.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
